languages.text: {n}Духовная опека обитателей Фолстоуна была вручена тихим, безвольным и погруженным в себя существам. Они не произносили проповедей, не искореняли грех и, кажется, не осознавали своего высокого статуса. Они лишь молча трудились, и тысячи верующих, принося обеты молчания и послушания, следовали их примеру.{/n}

{n}The spiritual tutelage of the people of Foulstone was entrusted to the quiet, compliant, and withdrawn creatures known as the Touched. They did not preach or root out impurity, and they even seemed to be unaware of their high status. They simply worked without saying a word, and thousands of believers took vows of silence and obedience to follow their example.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Духовная опека обитателей Фолстоуна была вручена тихим, безвольным и погруженным в себя существам. Они не произносили проповедей, не искореняли грех и, кажется, не осознавали своего высокого статуса. Они лишь молча трудились, и тысячи верующих, принося обеты молчания и послушания, следовали их примеру.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The spiritual tutelage of the people of Foulstone was entrusted to the quiet, compliant, and withdrawn creatures known as the Touched. They did not preach, did not root out impurity, and even seemed to be unaware of their high status. They simply worked without saying a word, and thousands of believers took vows of silence and obedience so that they could follow their example.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这群安静、孤僻且顺从的受召者被任命为荒寂岩地人民的精神导师。他们不会讲道，不会根除污秽，甚至似乎无法意识到自己的崇高地位。他们只是一言不发地埋头工作，成千上万的信徒以他们为榜样，发誓沉默、顺从。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spiritual tutelage of the people of Foulstone was entrusted to the quiet, compliant, and withdrawn creatures known as the Touched. They did not preach or root out impurity, and they even seemed to be unaware of their high status. They simply worked without saying a word, and thousands of believers took vows of silence and obedience to follow their example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这群安静、孤僻且顺从的受召者被任命为荒寂岩地人民的精神导师。他们不会讲道，不会根除污秽，甚至似乎无法意识到自己的崇高地位。他们只是一言不发地埋头工作，成千上万的信徒以他们为榜样，发誓沉默、顺从。{/n}
{n}这群安静、孤僻且顺从的受召者被任命为荒寂岩地人民的精神导师。他们不会讲道，不会根除污秽，甚至似乎无法意识到自己的崇高地位。他们只是一言不发地埋头工作，成千上万的信徒以他们为榜样，发誓沉默、顺从。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La guía espiritual del pueblo de Rocainmunda se confió a las criaturas calladas, sumisas y retraídas conocidas como los Tocados. No predicaban, no erradicaban la impureza e incluso parecían no ser conscientes de su elevado estatus. Simplemente trabajaban sin decir palabra, y miles de fieles hicieron votos de silencio y obediencia para seguir su ejemplo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spiritual tutelage of the people of Foulstone was entrusted to the quiet, compliant, and withdrawn creatures known as the Touched. They did not preach or root out impurity, and they even seemed to be unaware of their high status. They simply worked without saying a word, and thousands of believers took vows of silence and obedience to follow their example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La guía espiritual del pueblo de Rocainmunda se confió a las criaturas calladas, sumisas y retraídas conocidas como los Tocados. No predicaban, no erradicaban la impureza e incluso parecían no ser conscientes de su elevado estatus. Simplemente trabajaban sin decir palabra, y miles de fieles hicieron votos de silencio y obediencia para seguir su ejemplo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ファウルストーンの民の精神的な指導は、触れられし者と知られる、おとなしく、従順で、内向的な生物に託された。彼らは説教をせず、不純を根絶にするわけでもなく、自分たちの高い地位にすら気づいていないようだった。彼らはただ黙々と働き、何千人もの信者が沈黙と服従の誓いを立て、彼らの模範に従った。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spiritual tutelage of the people of Foulstone was entrusted to the quiet, compliant, and withdrawn creatures known as the Touched. They did not preach or root out impurity, and they even seemed to be unaware of their high status. They simply worked without saying a word, and thousands of believers took vows of silence and obedience to follow their example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ファウルストーンの民の精神的な指導は、触れられし者と知られる、おとなしく、従順で、内向的な生物に託された。彼らは説教をせず、不純を根絶にするわけでもなく、自分たちの高い地位にすら気づいていないようだった。彼らはただ黙々と働き、何千人もの信者が沈黙と服従の誓いを立て、彼らの模範に従った。{/n}
{n}ファウルストーンの民の精神的な指導は、触れられし者と知られる、おとなしく、従順で、内向的な生物に託された。彼らは説教をせず、不純を根絶にするわけでもなく、自分たちの高い地位にすら気づいていないようだった。彼らはただ黙々と働き、何千人もの信者が沈黙と服従の誓いを立て、彼らの模範に従った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La tutelle spirituelle des habitants de Rochepeste est confiée aux créatures discrètes, obéissantes et taciturnes connues sous le nom d'Altérés. Ils ne prêchent pas la bonne parole, ne s'attachent pas à éradiquer les comportements impurs et ne semblent même pas conscients de leur statut privilégié. Ils se contentent de travailler sans dire un mot, et des milliers de croyants choisissent de suivre leur exemple en faisant vœu de silence et d'obéissance.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spiritual tutelage of the people of Foulstone was entrusted to the quiet, compliant, and withdrawn creatures known as the Touched. They did not preach or root out impurity, and they even seemed to be unaware of their high status. They simply worked without saying a word, and thousands of believers took vows of silence and obedience to follow their example.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La tutelle spirituelle des habitants de Rochepeste est confiée aux créatures discrètes, obéissantes et taciturnes connues sous le nom d'Altérés. Ils ne prêchent pas la bonne parole, ne s'attachent pas à éradiquer les comportements impurs et ne semblent même pas conscients de leur statut privilégié. Ils se contentent de travailler sans dire un mot, et des milliers de croyants choisissent de suivre leur exemple en faisant vœu de silence et d'obéissance.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die spirituelle Führung der Bewohner von Foulstone wurde den stillen, gefügigen und zurückgezogenen Kreaturen anvertraut, die man nur die Berührten nannte. Sie predigten nicht und merzten keine Unreinheit aus. Sie schienen sich nicht einmal bewusst zu sein, dass sie einen höheren Status genossen. Sie arbeiteten einfach wortlos, und Tausende von Gläubigen legten Schweigegelübde ab und schworen Gehorsam, um ihrem Beispiel zu folgen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spiritual tutelage of the people of Foulstone was entrusted to the quiet, compliant, and withdrawn creatures known as the Touched. They did not preach or root out impurity, and they even seemed to be unaware of their high status. They simply worked without saying a word, and thousands of believers took vows of silence and obedience to follow their example.{/n}

Sie predigten nicht, sie merzten keine Unreinheit aus, sie schienen sich nicht einmal bewusst zu sein, dass sie einen höheren Status genossen. Sie arbeiteten einfach wortlos, und tausende von Gläubigen legten Schweigegelübde ab und schworen Gehorsam, um ihrem Beispiel zu folgen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Menfurtaş halkının ruhani gözetimi, Mütehassisler olarak bilinen sessiz, uysal ve içine kapanık yaratıklara emanet edildi. Ne vaaz verdiler ne de günahkârlığın kökünü kazıdılar. Hatta sahip oldukları yüksek statünün farkında bile değil gibiydiler. Tek bir kelime bile etmeden yalnızca çalıştılar ve binlerce inançlı, onların izinden yürümek için sessizlik ve itaatkârlık andı içti.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The spiritual tutelage of the people of Foulstone was entrusted to the quiet, compliant, and withdrawn creatures known as the Touched. They did not preach or root out impurity, and they even seemed to be unaware of their high status. They simply worked without saying a word, and thousands of believers took vows of silence and obedience to follow their example.{/n}
